title: Good News for Good Omens | S2 Announcement | Prime Video #Short
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: What are your predictions for Season 2?

Good Omens Season 2 is announced.

Good Omens fandom: I'm having a moment here!
ITS HAPPENING EVERYONE ITS HAPPENING EVERYBODY STAY CALM STAY CALM
I'm so happy but also scared because the ending of season 1 was PERFECT!

"You WOT?!"
-Me talking to Amazon after reading the title
description:
It's official, Good Omens is coming back for a second season! They managed to convince Heaven and Hell to leave them alone, but what will they be facing instead? You'll have to wait and find out! Watch Good Omens Season 1 on Prime Video.
